scripts.build:dev: vite build --mode development && scp ./dist/index.html shadowuser@5.181.51.167:/tmp/ && scp -r ./dist/assets shadowuser@5.181.51.167:/tmp/ && ssh shadowuser@5.181.51.167 "mv /tmp/index.html /www/wwwroot/dev.tempusplaza.xyz/ && rm -rf /www/wwwroot/dev.tempusplaza.xyz/assets && mv /tmp/assets /www/wwwroot/dev.tempusplaza.xyz/ && find /www/wwwroot/dev.tempusplaza.xyz \! -name '.user.ini' -type d -exec chmod 755 {} \; && find /www/wwwroot/dev.tempusplaza.xyz \! -name '.user.ini' -type f -exec chmod 644 {} \;"
